reasoning: Well-defined psychiatric disorder with robust epidemiological data. Incidence approximately 15.2 per 100k person-years globally; lifetime prevalence approximately 0.4% (400 per 100k). Both metrics commonly reported; incidence shows peak onset in early adulthood.
source: McGrath J et al. (2008). Schizophrenia: a concise overview of incidence, prevalence, and mortality. Epidemiol Rev. 30:67-76
